description.value:
You meander around unpredictably, and then ambush your opponents without warning.

Choose one enemy. @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Stride]{Stride}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Feint]{Feint} against that opponent, and then make a @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Strike]{Strike} against that foe. For your Feint, you can attempt a Stealth check instead of the Deception check that's usually required, because you use the terrain around you to catch your foe off-guard.
